entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
